name: Awaken: Underwater Odyssey
description:
Awaken: Underwater Odyssey is vertical scrolling shoot em up game. Game takes place in far future on planet Neptune. You are member of Kraken squad whitch is stationed inside Leviathan class carrier craft owned by RPE corporation whitch oversees gas extracting operations on neptune.

Game is about anihilating thousands of squid like aliens while you pilot Orca MK II submarine whitch is highly customizable to fit pilots style.

Features:
  • modular ship customization offering 27 possible configurations
  • four main missions
  • boss alley mode
  • infinite onslaught mode
  • stunning djent soundtrack made by Develop Device
  • simple but rewarding scoring system
  • handcrafted pixel graphics
  • supports xbox360 controller
Controls
  • X - fire in standart mode
  • C - fire in siege mode
  • V - toggle solo/squad mode
  • SPACE - fire torpedo(solo mode only)
  • Arrows - movement

More detailed description aviable ingame by clicking "?" icon in hangar.

Downloads:

Right now you can download demo containing first two missions for free and if you ll enjoy it you can support this project by purchasing full version of the game.
